name: Homework Arena
description:
Homework Arena

Uh oh, looks like someone's letting homework pile up again!

Homework Arena was our team's answer to the Ubisoft Game Lab 2022's theme: the student experience. Homework Arena takes a memorable part of school, like being swamped by a load of homework, and turns it into an action game with a big focus on team competition. 

Homework Arena ended up being a double award winner, earning the Best User Experience and the Best Technical Challenge and Innovation awards! Other nominations for Homework Arena also include: Best Creativity and Theme Integration, Best 3Cs and Best Prototype. Developing this game was definitely challenging, amounting to many sleepless nights, but that didn't stop our team from delivering an excellent product!
